data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Novo Selo.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Novo Selo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Novo Selo to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary: On average, 2 will die without Jesus in the next month in Novo Selo, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Novo Selo, North Macedonia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Novo Selo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Albanian, Macedonian people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Albanian, Macedonian people know you.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Novo Selo, North Macedonia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Novo Selo who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Novo Selo, North Macedonia has a population of 2,800.

We estimate Novo Selo has 5 people who might know Jesus, 1,731 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,065 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 560 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Novo Selo, North Macedonia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
